fix_attempts.description: Updated v0.84.0 changelog â€” now includes 16 entries: 3 features + 13 fixes (added #1474 missing seq code fix + #1485 delegate tooltip fix)
Use typ.Format context instead of TypeDefinition.DisplayName in formatFSharpType to preserve | null annotations
Handle href and langword in seealso XML doc rendering in TipFormatter.fs
Emit Keyword semantic token for null in SynType.WithNull nullable type annotations; merged 2026-02-25
Resolve inheritdoc cref in XML doc tooltips; merged 2026-02-25
Report all curried parameters in FunctionApplication signature help; merged 2026-02-25
Rebase #1157 - code fix for FS0043 wildcard | _ -> in pattern match; merged 2026-02-26 by Krzysztof-Cieslak
Superseded by maintainer's own PR #1486 (rebase-1431 branch by Krzysztof-Cieslak)

notes: Feb 2026 run (22522084576): Commented on #789 (open insertion inconsistency - root cause in ResolveNamespace.adjustInsertionPoint TopModule override; TODO comment in Commands.fs already tracks it). Commented on #653 (type alias display - getAbbreviatedType utils exist in TypedAstPatterns.fs; fix in formatFSharpType with config flag). Issues still to comment: #481 (go-to-def decompiled), #486 (decompiler throw null), #525 (AST model), #605 (script ref), #654 (snap installs), #705 (debugging), #712 (fsl/fsy support), #733 (workspaceFolders), #847 (Fantomas update UX), #871 (raspberrypi startup), #900 (LSIF), #1316 (extract TipFormatters), #1338 (dotnet binary FreeBSD - upstream proj-info issue). PR #1482/#1483/#1484 created in previous runs as regression tests.
